name: automation_cypress
description: Project to run E2E Cypress tests for the booking project

scripts.docker:local:desktop:preprod:fr: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=fr,language=fr,grepTags=@sbx_fr,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js
scripts.docker:local:mobile:preprod:fr: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=fr,language=fr,grepTags=@sbx_fr,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js
scripts.docker:local:desktop:preprod:it: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=it,language=it,grepTags=@sbx_it,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js
scripts.docker:local:mobile:preprod:it: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=it,language=it,grepTags=@sbx_it,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js
scripts.docker:local:desktop:preprod:be: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=bon,country=be,language=nl,grepTags=@bon_be,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js
scripts.docker:local:mobile:preprod:be: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=bon,country=be,language=nl,grepTags=@bon_be,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js
scripts.docker:local:desktop:devint:fr: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=devint,brand=sbx,country=fr,language=fr,grepTags=@sbx_fr,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js
scripts.docker:local:mobile:devint:fr: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=devint,brand=sbx,country=fr,language=fr,grepTags=@sbx_fr,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js
scripts.docker:local:desktop:devint:it: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=devint,brand=sbx,country=it,language=it,grepTags=@sbx_it,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js
scripts.docker:local:mobile:devint:it: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=devint,brand=sbx,country=it,language=it,grepTags=@sbx_it,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js
scripts.docker:local:desktop:devint:be: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=devint,brand=bon,country=be,language=nl,grepTags=@bon_be,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js
scripts.docker:local:mobile:devint:be: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress open --env environment=local,backend=devint,brand=bon,country=be,language=nl,grepTags=@bon_be,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js
scripts.docker:local:validate:e2e: docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress run -b chrome --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=fr,language=fr,grepTags=@sbx_fr,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/Jarvis ;docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress run  -b chrome --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=fr,language=fr,grepTags=@sbx_fr,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/Jarvis ;docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress run -b chrome  --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=it,language=it,grepTags=@sbx_it,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/external  --config chromeWebSecurity=false  ;docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress run -b chrome  --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=it,language=it,grepTags=@sbx_it,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/external/  --config chromeWebSecurity=false  ;docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress run -b chrome --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=bon,country=be,language=nl,grepTags=@bon_be,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/Jarvis ;docker exec -it cypress_cypress_1 cypress run -b chrome --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=bon,country=be,language=nl,grepTags=@bon_be,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/Jarvis
scripts.cypress:local:validate:e2e: cypress run -b chrome --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=fr,language=fr,grepTags=@sbx_fr,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/Jarvis ; cypress run  -b chrome --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=fr,language=fr,grepTags=@sbx_fr,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/Jarvis ; cypress run -b chrome  --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=it,language=it,grepTags=@sbx_it,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/external  --config chromeWebSecurity=false  ; cypress run -b chrome  --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=sbx,country=it,language=it,grepTags=@sbx_it,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/external/  --config chromeWebSecurity=false  ; cypress run -b chrome --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=bon,country=be,language=nl,grepTags=@bon_be,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-desktop.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/Jarvis ; cypress run -b chrome --env environment=local,backend=preprod,brand=bon,country=be,language=nl,grepTags=@bon_be,enablePerformanceValidation=false --config-file cypress-mobile.config.js --spec e2e/E2E/Jarvis
